name: Fire Flora #8
description:
Working across the disciplines of painting and digital media, I use my work as a platform to raise awareness about the ecological perils facing the planet. This artwork was made with fire itself after horrendous bushfires devastated my region on the south east coast of Australia in 2019/20. Here, the ghost of a generic floral motive floats above a charred background, hinting at the disappearance of human 'civilisation'on Earth.   

https://linktr.ee/KatherineBoland
